resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

epic.name: Provide more and better publicized Alloy samples & demos
epic.summary: Make existing and new Alloy samples & demos more prominent and available

fields.summary: Better expose Alloy github sample/test apps in documentation

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
We need to update docs as part of the larger Epic ticket. 

We'll need to update existing pages (such as http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/Alloy_Samples) and possibly create new ones.
fields.summary: Update docs related to Alloy samples

comments.body: Resolving this because the associated docs ticket has been resolved. The new guides should publicize the samples enough to satisfy the goals of this ticket.
